titleStmt.title: The first parte, of the eyghth liberall science: entituled, Ars adulandi, the arte of flatterie with the confutation therof, both very pleasaunt and profitable, deuised and compiled, by Vlpian Fulwell.
titleStmt.author: Fulwell, Ulpian, fl. 1586.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [William How for] Richarde Iones, and are to bee solde at his shoppe ouer agaynst Sainct Sepulchers Churche,

notesStmt.note: Actual printer's name and publication date from STC.
A variant of the edition with year "1579" in the imprint--Cf. STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shoppe ouer agaynst Sainct Sepulchers Churche
